Package com.example.hotelapplication.controllers

Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.hotelapplication.controllers.ReservationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/reservations") public class ReservationController extends Object
Controller class for handling Reservation-related operations.

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getReservations()
      Retrieves a list of all reservations.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the list of ReservationDTOs and reservations view.

    • getReservationsUser

      @GetMapping("/userReservations") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getReservationsUser(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves a list of reservations for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the list of ReservationDTOs and userReservations view.

    • getReservationById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReservationDTO> getReservationById(@PathVariable("id") UUID reservationId)
      Retrieves a specific reservation by ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The UUID of the reservation to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the ReservationDTO if found, otherwise HttpStatus NOT_FOUND.

    • edit

      @GetMapping("/edit/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView edit(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)
      Retrieves the edit reservation view with data pre-populated for editing.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the reservation to edit.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the editReservations view with pre-populated data.

    • create

      @GetMapping("/createReservations") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView create()
      Retrieves the create reservation view.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the createReservations view with necessary data.

    • insertReservation

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertReservation(@ModelAttribute ReservationDTO reservationDTO, @RequestParam("personId") UUID idPerson, @RequestParam("roomIds") List<UUID> idRooms)
      Inserts a new reservation into the database.
      Parameters:
      reservationDTO - The ReservationDTO object to be inserted.
      idPerson - The UUID of the person making the reservation.
      idRooms - The UUIDs of the rooms booked in the reservation.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for redirecting to the reservations/all page after insertion.

    • insertReservationUser

      @PostMapping("/createReservationUser") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertReservationUser(@ModelAttribute ReservationDTO reservationDTO, @RequestParam("roomIds") List<UUID> idRooms, @RequestParam("startDate") LocalDate startDate, @RequestParam("endDate") LocalDate endDate, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Inserts a new reservation for the authenticated user into the database.
      Parameters:
      reservationDTO - The ReservationDTO object to be inserted.
      idRooms - The UUIDs of the rooms booked in the reservation.
      startDate - The start date of the reservation.
      endDate - The end date of the reservation.
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for redirecting to the reservations/userReservations page after insertion.

    • updateReservation

      @PostMapping("/edit/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateReservation(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @ModelAttribute("reservationDTO") ReservationDTO reservationDTO, @RequestParam("roomIds") List<UUID> idRooms, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Updates an existing reservation in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the reservation to be updated.
      reservationDTO - The updated ReservationDTO object.
      idRooms - The UUIDs of the rooms to be updated in the reservation.
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for redirecting to the appropriate page based on the role after update.

    • deleteReservation

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteReservation(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deletes a reservation from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the reservation to be deleted.
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for redirecting to the appropriate page based on the role after deletion.
